testcase.classname: Global Trader Login Page Forget Password
testcase.name: if user forget the password, user can recreate password by clicking forget password button
testcase.failure:
Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks sign in button.............................................passed When user is on Login page "Login"..........................................passed When user clicks forget password button on login page.......................passed When user is on "Forgot Form" page..........................................passed When user input valid email to email box....................................passed When user clicks forget password button.....................................passed Then verify new password link has been send.................................failed
